63671d41.name: AI Engineer
63671d41.jd:
We are seeking a skilled AI Engineer to design, build, and deploy intelligent systems that solve real-world problems at scale. You will work closely with data scientists, software engineers, and product teams to develop production-ready machine learning and deep learning solutions.

Key Responsibilities

Design and implement machine learning and deep learning models for real-world applications

Build scalable AI pipelines for data preprocessing, training, evaluation, and deployment

Optimize model performance, latency, and inference efficiency

Develop APIs and integrate AI models into production systems

Conduct experiments and analyze results to improve model accuracy

Maintain model monitoring, versioning, and retraining workflows

Stay updated with latest research and integrate relevant advancements

Required Skills

Strong proficiency in Python

Hands-on experience with ML/DL frameworks such as PyTorch or TensorFlow

Solid understanding of machine learning algorithms and statistics

Experience with data processing libraries (NumPy, Pandas, etc.)

Knowledge of REST APIs and backend frameworks (FastAPI, Flask, etc.)

Familiarity with SQL and NoSQL databases

Understanding of software engineering best practices and Git workflows

technical_depth.reasoning: Candidate demonstrates strong understanding of various DL architectures (CNNs, GANs, LLMs) and frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow) through impressive projects.

project_quality.reasoning: Projects like 'legalRAG' are highly relevant, showcasing practical application of advanced AI concepts (RAG, LLMs, FastAPI) with good technical depth.

experience_relevance.reasoning: Despite being a student, internships and projects are directly relevant to AI/ML engineering, covering RAG, deep learning workflows, and API integration.

github_activity.reasoning: Good number of repositories, consistent commits, and highly relevant pinned projects, indicating active engagement in AI/ML development.

skill_match.reasoning: Excellent match with required skills including Python, PyTorch/TensorFlow, ML algorithms, data processing, FastAPI, and Git, all demonstrated in projects.

overall_fit.reasoning: Strong fit for an AI Engineer role, especially given the focus on practical application of LLMs, RAG, and deep learning, aligning well with the JD.

areas_for_improvement: Limited full-time professional experience (due to student status)
Potentially less experience with large-scale production deployment

recommendation.reasoning: Candidate demonstrates exceptional practical skills in AI/ML, particularly with LLMs and RAG, backed by strong projects and relevant internships, making them a strong hire.

detailed_feedback.technical_assessment: Excellent grasp of deep learning architectures and practical implementation skills, especially with RAG systems and FastAPI.
detailed_feedback.culture_fit: Proactive, self-learner, and project-driven, suggesting a good fit for an innovative team.
detailed_feedback.growth_potential: High growth potential given the strong foundation and demonstrated ability to learn and apply advanced concepts.
detailed_feedback.salary_alignment: Current CTC is well below the role's offer, indicating good alignment and potential for a significant increase.

education.degree: B. Tech Computer Science and Engineering w/s AIML
education.institution: SRM Institute of Science and Technology

work_experience.title: ML Development Consultant
work_experience.highlights: Built and optimized deep learning workflows for model training, evaluation, and benchmarking across multiple model architectures, while also implementing custom performance analysis and reproducibility frameworks and benchmarking LLM agents on various evaluation techniques.

work_experience.title: Software Development Intern
work_experience.highlights: Developed a RAG system enabling natural language queries to relational databases, implementing SQL query generation with 95%+ accuracy, intelligent fallback mechanisms, and error handling for enterprise data access.

work_experience.title: Research Intern
work_experience.highlights: Analyzed vehicle trajectory data at roundabouts to detect anomalies and perform multiple analyses including lane discipline, speed compliance, speed violations and gap acceptance, supporting predictive traffic safety systems.

work_experience.title: Junior AI Engineer
work_experience.highlights: Conceptualized and developed automation processes integrating multiple APIs for data ingestion, building custom databases with intelligent fallback mechanisms to improve operational efficiency for FinTech and VC clients, and also documented and maintained automated agent systems reducing manual effort by 60%.

projects.name: Legal Document RAG Chatbot
projects.description: Designed a legal document RAG system using Pinecone for semantic search, FastAPI for scalable backend, and LangChain with Llama 3.3, improving retrieval accuracy by 7% while enabling contextual legal understanding.

projects.name: GAN-based Augmentation for Imbalanced Datasets
projects.description: Constructed a Conditional GAN to generate high-quality synthetic samples for underrepresented minority classes, significantly improving overall classification performance by 22% under class imbalance scenarios.

projects.name: U-Net Image Segmentation Implementation
projects.description: Engineered U-Net architecture for image segmentation, achieving 98% accuracy and 95% IoU through careful model design, loss optimization, and extensive evaluation across datasets benchmarks consistently at scale.

resume_analysis.summary: Highly motivated B.Tech Computer Science and Engineering student specializing in AIML, with a strong foundation in deep learning, programming, and development tools. Possessing practical experience through internships in ML development, software development, and research, focusing on building AI/ML systems, RAG, and automation. Eager to apply expertise in artificial intelligence and machine learning to innovative projects and contribute to cutting-edge technological advancements.

recommendation.reasoning: Analysis incomplete — could not fully evaluate candidate.

Possessing practical experience as an AI Engineer Intern and Research Intern, adept at deploying production-ready RAG systems, optimizing AI/ML solutions, and researching prompt security. Demonstrated ability to innovate and deliver efficient, scalable solutions with a focus on real-world impact.

5c892af7.name: Frontend Dev
5c892af7.jd:
About the Role

We are looking for a skilled Front-End Developer to build responsive, high-performance web interfaces. You will work closely with designers, backend engineers, and product teams to deliver scalable and user-friendly applications.

Key Responsibilities

Develop responsive and interactive web applications using modern front-end technologies

Translate UI/UX designs into clean, maintainable code

Optimize applications for performance, scalability, and accessibility

Integrate front-end components with APIs and backend services

Ensure cross-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness

Participate in code reviews and maintain coding standards

Debug and resolve UI issues and bugs

Required Skills & Qualifications

Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

Experience with modern frameworks such as React, Vue, or Angular

Strong understanding of responsive design and CSS frameworks

Familiarity with version control systems like Git

Knowledge of REST APIs and asynchronous programming

Good problem-solving and debugging skills

Preferred Qualifications

Experience with TypeScript

Familiarity with state management libraries (Redux, Zustand, Pinia, etc.)

Knowledge of testing frameworks (Jest, Cypress, Playwright)

Understanding of web performance optimization techniques

Experience working in Agile environments

Soft Skills

Strong communication and collaboration skills

Attention to detail

Ability to work independently and manage time effectively

Benefits

Competitive salary

Flexible working hours

Learning and development opportunities

Health benefits and paid leave

technical_depth.reasoning: Deep in ML/AI and Python, but lacks demonstrated proficiency in core frontend technologies required for the role.

project_quality.reasoning: Projects are high-quality and complex, but entirely focused on ML/AI and backend, not frontend development.

experience_relevance.reasoning: All work experience is in ML/AI and backend development, with no direct relevance to frontend engineering.

github_activity.reasoning: GitHub shows consistent activity and numerous repositories, but the primary languages and projects are not frontend-focused.

skill_match.reasoning: Candidate lacks critical frontend framework experience (React, Vue, Angular) and demonstrated proficiency in modern HTML/CSS/JS.

overall_fit.reasoning: The candidate's profile is that of an ML/AI specialist, not a frontend developer, resulting in a poor fit for this role.

strengths: Experience with Git and API integration (backend)
areas_for_improvement: Lack of modern frontend framework experience (React, Vue, Angular)
Limited demonstrated proficiency in core HTML, CSS, JavaScript for UI
No experience with responsive design or state management libraries

recommendation.reasoning: The candidate's extensive experience and projects are almost exclusively in ML/AI and backend development, with a significant lack of required frontend skills and framework experience.

detailed_feedback.technical_assessment: Candidate demonstrates strong technical depth in ML/AI, Python, and related backend technologies, but lacks the specific frontend framework and UI development skills essential for this role.
detailed_feedback.culture_fit: Cannot be assessed from the provided data, but general programming background suggests potential adaptability.
detailed_feedback.growth_potential: High in ML/AI domain; however, significant upskilling would be required to transition into a dedicated frontend role.
detailed_feedback.salary_alignment: The proposed salary is attractive compared to current CTC, but the skill mismatch makes this irrelevant.
